'''2.1.1216''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.1217''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.1218''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on June 28, 2018.

== Additions ==
* Profiles can now be sorted by name or last play date.
* Added a Copy button, which can copy a profile to another profile.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-7178}}: Failed to Login: Bad login on old versions.
* {{bug|MCL-7282}}: Minecraft Launcher fails to pass Session ID to pre 1.7.2 Minecraft clients.
* {{bug|MCL-8112}}: Launcher tries to create "logs" directory in /opt/minecraft-launcher.
* {{bug|MCL-8389}}: Log output not auto-scrolling.
* {{bug|MCL-8649}}: Linux: "<code>Missing key 'natives-linux' on libraries[*].downloads</code>" when downloading versions 1.8 and lower.
* {{bug|MCL-8724}}: Linux launcher doesn't set working directory when launching.
* {{bug|MCL-9440}}: New Launcher launches minecraft with a working directory at the location of the launcher instead of the <code>.minecraft</code> directory.
